meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of the tropics.
meanings.sent1: The plants grew tropically in the warm, humid climate.
meanings.sent2: She dressed tropically for her vacation in the Caribbean.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys danced tropically under the palm trees.
meanings.sent4: The music transported me tropically to a sandy beach.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset painted the sky tropically.

meanings.definition: Relating to or occurring in the tropics.
meanings.sent1: The tropically themed party had palm tree decorations.
meanings.sent2: They enjoyed the tropically flavored fruits from the market.
meanings.sent3: The parrot had a tropically colored plumage.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a tropically inspired floral pattern.
meanings.sent5: The resort offered a tropically decorated room with a view of the ocean.
